mapper.select: select cu.id,ui.name,ui.phone,cu.community_id,cu.user_id,r.name as roleName from community_user cu inner join user u inner join user_info ui inner join user_role_permission urp inner join role r on cu.del_flag = 0 and u.del_flag = 0 and urp.del_flag = 0 and urp.role_id = r.id and urp.user_id = u.id and ui.id = u.student_id and u.id = cu.user_id and cu.community_id = #{communityId} and cu.user_id != #{loginUserId}
